item.title: Being safe on a motorcycle is about making good decisions. Don’t rush to a space you can’t fully see and don’t push yourself to do something. You’re not comfortable with. #Motorcycle #MotorcycleAdvice #beginnermotorcycle #yamahar7 #r7
item.description: Being safe on a motorcycle is about making good decisions. Don’t rush to a space you can’t fully see and don’t push yourself to do something. You’re not comfortable with. #Motorcycle #MotorcycleAdvice #beginnermotorcycle #yamahar7 #r7

item.title: It’s always best to keep your batteries on tenders when you are not riding often. Sometimes the problem corrects itself other times you’ll need a jump. ##Motorcycle##battery##troublestartingamotorcycle##deadbattery##startingamotorcycle
item.description: It’s always best to keep your batteries on tenders when you are not riding often. Sometimes the problem corrects itself other times you’ll need a jump. ##Motorcycle##battery##troublestartingamotorcycle##deadbattery##startingamotorcycle

item.title: What are yall think about the two camera set up? Trying to give you guys a different perspective on riding. I think being able to see my head moving as post just looking at my eyes might help some people. #motorcycle #howtorideamotorcycle #motorbike #yama
